item.title: Be Critical of the Information You Receive
item.description: One of the hallmarks of being an adult is the ability to make decisions and handle the outcome of those decisions. Another is being able to recognize that you may not have all of the data or knowledge required to make an informed decision and need to find that by asking more knowledgeable people and doing research of your own. Itâ€™s important to remember that when asking people to share their knowledge that they are just people like us: they have thoughts, feelings, motives, and biases too.
